body_html:
This question is probably better for stackoverflow as we try to keep the github issues focused on bugs and feature requests.

See also https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup#optional_linux_enable_gpu_support which is consistent with what @MalcolmSun was suggesting

body:
This question is probably better for [stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) as we try to keep the github issues focused on bugs and feature requests.

See also  https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup#optional_linux_enable_gpu_support which is consistent with what @MalcolmSun was suggesting
